Q4 FY25 Results:

Consolidated net profit experienced a significant decline of 77% year-on-year to ₹39 crore.

Consolidated operating revenue, however, grew by over 63% year-on-year to ₹5,833 crore.

This discrepancy is attributed to increased spending in the competitive quick commerce sector (Blinkit).

FY25 Full-Year Results:

Consolidated net profit soared to ₹527 crore for the year, a substantial increase from ₹351 crore in the previous fiscal year.

The company registered 67% year-on-year growth in its topline for the full year.

Board Meeting:A board meeting was scheduled for May 1, 2025, to consider and approve the company's audited financial results for the year ended March 2025.

Earnings Call:A transcript of the earnings conference call held on May 1, 2025, was filed with the Exchange on May 8, 2025.
